Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bee line \Bee" line`\ The shortest line from one place to another, like that of a bee to its hive when loaded with honey; an air line. ``A bee line for the brig.'' --Kane. [1913 Webster]
beeline n : the most direct route; "he made a beeline for the bathroom"
